para.text: The main operation panel is used to perform the basic machine operations and consists of switches and lamps. Standard specifications and CE specifications have minor differences.
The primary functions include the following:

li.text: Spindle, coolant supply and other frequently used machine related operations
Operations in event of error or malfunction
